title: Score Babbel Language Learning for under $150 before time runs out
content:
Macworld

When great deals on name brands come up, you’ve got to move fast…because who knows when an opportunity that good will come around again.

When it comes to language learning (and we don’t mean coding languages), few brand names shine as brightly as Babbel — so when you’re faced with a last-chance offer to get a lifetime subscription to Babbel’s vast language acquisition tools and training for a price like $149.97, you definitely need to jump before it’s gone.

With a Babbel subscription, you choose from one of Babbel’s 14 available language options, ranging from basics like Spanish, French, or Italian to more exotic choices like Polish, Swedish, or Turkish.

Using Babbel’s renowned immersive learning technique, contextual learning helps build up vocabulary and grammar skills fast through practice and conversation about subjects real people discuss every day.

Based on schedule-friendly 10-to-15 minute lessons featuring games, podcasts, articles, videos, and more, Babbel lessons immediately get learners using simple greetings, asking basic questions, and understanding practical words and phrases on topics like ordering in a restaurant, asking directions, or building relationships with friends and family.

As the learning sinks in, Babbel’s personalized lesson reviews inspect your progress, using speech recognition technology to make sure you’re speaking your new language as well as you’re understanding it so users can be speaking confidently in their new language in as little as three weeks.

Right now, you’re in the final days for scooping up Babbel at one of the lowest prices of the year. 

Get full lifetime access to training in all of Babbel’s 14 language options for only $149.97, a savings of almost 75% off the $599 retail price with no coupon needed. But the deal is only available until Apr. 23 at 11:59  p.m., so hurry.
